Module nl.meron.yaeger
Package nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.tilemap

Interface WithTileMaps

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DimensionsProvider, RequiresInjection, WithSupplier, WithTileMapList
    public interface WithTileMaps
extends WithSupplier, WithTileMapList, DimensionsProvider, RequiresInjection
    Implementing this interface exposes the addTileMap(TileMap) method. An TileMap that is instantiated, but not registered, will not be added to the YaegerScene.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void addTileMap​(TileMap tileMap)
      Register an TileMap.
      default void initTileMaps()  
      void setupTileMaps()
      Only instances of Timer that are registered with the method addTileMap(TileMap) within this method are registered and will receive an animation update.

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.meron.yaeger.engine.scenes.DimensionsProvider

        getHeight, getWidth

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.meron.yaeger.engine.RequiresInjection

        getInjector

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.meron.yaeger.engine.scenes.WithSupplier

        getEntitySupplier

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.tilemap.WithTileMapList

        getTileMaps

    • Method Detail

      • setupTileMaps

        void setupTileMaps()
        Only instances of Timer that are registered with the method addTileMap(TileMap) within this method are registered and will receive an animation update.

      • initTileMaps

        default void initTileMaps()

      • addTileMap

        default void addTileMap​(TileMap tileMap)
        Register an TileMap.
        Parameters:
        tileMap - The TileMap that should be registered.
